title: Kate Langley
deck: Hi. My name is Kate and I lead a life group with Sarah Curry. I have been at Gateway since 2015 and feel very settled here. I am an archaeologist, which basically means I play in mud all day! At Gateway I am also a CAP Money coach, helping to run money management courses, and I help organise @ - the 20's and 30's social group. I enjoy reading, watching sport and tv, and spending time with friends and family.
